text:
we sometimes have superflous namespaces in the output, this can be fixed with:

  <!--
     - Namespace removing templates
     - from http://outerthought.net/wiki/Wiki.jsp?page=RemoveNamespaces
  -->
  <xsl:template match="*" priority="-1" mode="copy">
    <xsl:element name="{local-name()}">
      <xsl:copy-of select="@*"/>
      <xsl:apply-templates mode="copy"/>
    </xsl:element>
  </xsl:template>

  <xsl:template match="text()" mode="copy">
    <xsl:value-of select="."/>
  </xsl:template>
creator: gregor@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 28409 ***
